effects.value: Move one character token on a Crystallize %game.characterIconColoredBg.gemstone% back one space
Create hazardous terrain in one hex within %game.action.range% 1
On the next attack targeting you while you occupy hazardous terrain, discard this card to gain %game.action.retaliate% 3
On the next attack targeting you while you occupy hazardous terrain, discard this card to gain %game.action.shield% 3

special.value: All enemies that are adjacent to two pillars suffer L damage.
%game.action.teleport% to the next pillar in order %game.mapMarker.c%, %game.mapMarker.d%, %game.mapMarker.e%, %game.mapMarker.f%

subActions.value: %game.action.target% all enemies adjacent to exactly one pillar

actions.value: If killed, all characters and character summons gain %game.custom.disadvantage% on all their attacks

subActions.value: Target the closest enemy at any range

special.value: Remove one negative condition from all other Harrowers
All Harrower Infesters gain %game.action.range%3 on all their %game.action.retaliate% abilities this round

subActions.value: Target all enemies adjacent to at least one Harrower
Target discards one card or doubles the damage suffered from the attack

special.value: If the attack was performed, %game.action.move% back toward its starting location

actions.value: If killed, all enemies gain %game.custom.advantage% on all their attacks
If killed, all enemies at the end of their turn perform:
Moves towards exit %game.mapMarker.a% before determining enemy focus

sections.name: Looted less than two treasure tiles
Looted two or more treasure tiles

enraged-vanquisher.1:
If an enemy targets you with an attack
this round, that enemy gains
enraged-vanquisher.4: If a target occupies the hex, add the condition shown to the attack.
enraged-vanquisher.6: All attackers targeting you this round gain %game.condition.disarm% at the end of their turn.

enraged-vanquisher-scenario-71.1:
If an enemy targets you with an attack
this round, that enemy gains
enraged-vanquisher-scenario-71.4: If a target occupies the hex, add the condition shown to the attack.
enraged-vanquisher-scenario-71.6: All attackers targeting you this round gain %game.condition.disarm% at the end of their turn.
enraged-vanquisher-scenario-71.7: Swap positions with the figure closest to you.
enraged-vanquisher-scenario-71.8: %game.action.teleport% to a hex adjacent to %game.mapMarker.a% that is furthest from an enemy.

reaver.1: If killed, all enemies gain %game.custom.advantage% on all their attacks

smoke-spirit.1: Retaliate only applies before its turn
smoke-spirit.2:
Create a hazardous terrain tile in the
hex occupied by the target if it contains
no overlay tiles.
smoke-spirit.3:
Create a hazardous terrain tile in
all hexes occupied by a target if
it contains no overlay tiles.
smoke-spirit.5:
If the target of the attack ability is adjacent,
add %game.action.push% 2 to the attack.
smoke-spirit.6:
Create a hazardous terrain tile in the hex
the Smoke Spirit is occupying if it contains
no overlay tiles.
smoke-spirit.7:
Create a hazardous terrain tile in an empty
adjacent hex closest to an enemy.

valrath-vanquisher.1:
The Vanquisher
with the lowest
current hit point
value performs
valrath-vanquisher.2:
The Vanquisher with the
highest current hit point
value performs
valrath-vanquisher.3:
If both Vanquishers have the same hit point value, they both
perform all abilities.

641.1: Money tokes looted in scenarios with Living Bons, Living Corpses, or Living Spritits

642.1: Enemies killed with "Battle Standard" (Item 115) by allies with abilities granted by you

643.1: Option A choosed on an event
643.2: Option B choosed on an event

644.1: Enemies killed while they're adjacent to one or more of their allies

645.1: Enemies with initiative at least 20 slower than yours killed

646.1: Different scenarios where twice performed a loot action adjacent to an enemy

647.1: Scenarios completed used at least one Bush, Tree, or Thorns overlay

648.1: Long rests perfomred while an enemy is in the same room

toa.73: Each character gains X gold, where X is 3 times the number of money tokens remaining on the Stone Golem's statistic card.

toa.51A:
To view your reward, visit thecrimsonscales.com/reveal
Password: ashes

toa.33B: Looted less than two treasure tiles
toa.33C: Looted two or more treasure tiles

gemstone.1: and at the start of each scenario, you may play a level 1 card from your hand to perform a Crystallize %game.characterIconColoredBg.gemstone% action of the card.
gemstone.2: Once each scenario, when you would suffer damage from an attack, gain "%game.action.shield% 3" fo that attack
gemstone.3: Each time you long rest, perform "%game.condition.regenerate%, Self"

ice-meteor.1: At the start of each scenario, you may either gain %game.condition.wound% to generate %game.element.fire% or gain %game.condition.chill% to generate %game.element.ice%

lightning-ball.1: Whenever you dodge an attack, gain one Spark %game.characterIconColoredBg.lightning-ball%
lightning-ball.2: Whenever you long rest, you may gain %game.condition.dodge%
lightning-ball.3: Whenever you short rest, you may spent one Spark %game.characterIconColoredBg.lightning-ball%. If you do, one enemety within %game.action.range% 2 suffers one damage.

spiked-ring.1: Gain %game.action.shield% 1 while you occupy hazardous terrain

three-eyes.1: Each time you long rest, perform: %game.coloredToken.5cac66.toa-reaver% %game.coloredToken.c7386a.toa-ritualist% %game.coloredToken.336fa2.toa-conquerer%
three-eyes.2: You may bring one additional %game.items.slots.onehand% item into each scenario
three-eyes.3: Each time you short rest, Refresh %game.card.recover% one spent %game.items.slots.onehand%

toa-101.1: You can carry two additional "Orb" items.

toa-102.1: At the beginning of a round, after al ability cards have been revealed gain %game.condition.invisible%

toa-103.1: During your turn perform "%game.action.teleport% 5". This Teleport must end in a hex containing a treasure tile or money token.

toa-105.1: During your rangedAttack ability, place your character token on one of the target of the attack. That enemy loses %game.action.fly% after the attack.

toa-106.1: During your melee attack ability, add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.stun% to one attack.

toa-107.1: Remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus2% modifier card from your modifier deck.

toa-108.1: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.ice% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack and flip this card over.
toa-108.2: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.fire% to gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack and flip this card over.

toa-109.1: During your Heal, ability targeting Self, affect one ally within %game.action.range:3% instead.

toa-110.1: When you are adjacent to two or more enemies gain %game.action.retaliate% 1.

toa-111.1: When damaged by an attack perform a "%game.action.heal% X, %game.action.range:3%" ability after the attack, where X is the damage you suffered.

toa-112.1: During your melee Attack ability, before modifiers are draw, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack if your first modifier drawn is positive.

toa-113.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to your next ranged ability.

toa-114.1: During your Move ability, perform a %game.action.teleport% ability of equal value instead.

toa-115.1: During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform "%game.action.attack% 2".

toa-116.1: During your turn, you and all allies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.strengthen%, an all enemies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.muddle%.

toa-117.1: During your heal ability, add %game.condition.bless%, or %game.condition.empower%, %game.condition.empower%, %game.condition.empower% to a single heal.

toa-118.1: During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.curse%, or %game.condition.enfeeble%, %game.condition.enfeeble%, %game.condition.enfeeble% to a one attack.

toa-122.1: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 1 and %game.condition.wound% to one attack.

toa-124.1: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.wound% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack. You may consume %game.card.lost% this item instead to gain ADD %game.target%.

toa-126.1: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, change your leading initiative value to 100-X where X is the initiative value of your leading card.

toa-127.1: You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%, even if this item is spent. When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and gain %game.condition.dodge% after the attack.

toa-129.1: During your turn, remove negative condition from Self and perform "%game.action.heal% 3, Self". This can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.

toa-130.1: During your melee Attack ability, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.

toa.55: Either discard one card of suffer %game.damage:3% and gain %game.condition.wound%
toa.59: spawn one elite Forest Imp in the nearest empty hex. This elite Imp is an ally to you and an enemy to all other monster types. This Forest Imp gains %game.condition.wound% and cannot be healed
toa.60: Either discard one card of suffer %game.damage:3% and gain %game.condition.poison%
toa.65: place it to the top of the city event deck
